community.name: Sunny Acres Senior Living
community.overview: Sunny Acres is a premier senior living community in the heart of Denver, offering personalized care and luxurious amenities in a warm, welcoming environment.
community.description:
## Welcome to Sunny Acres

Sunny Acres Senior Living provides exceptional care in a beautiful setting. Our community features:

- **Award-winning dining** with chef-prepared meals
- **Spacious apartments** with modern finishes
- **Engaging activities** tailored to resident interests
- **Experienced staff** committed to personalized care

### Our Philosophy

We believe every resident deserves dignity, respect, and the freedom to live life on their own terms.
community.short_description: Premier senior living in Denver with personalized care, award-winning dining, and engaging activities.
community.seo_title: Sunny Acres Senior Living | Assisted Living in Denver, CO
community.seo_description: Sunny Acres offers premier senior living in Denver with personalized care, award-winning dining, and a vibrant community atmosphere.

care_types.name: Independent Living
care_types.description: Active lifestyle with minimal assistance and maximum independence

care_types.name: Assisted Living
care_types.description: Personalized support with daily activities while maintaining independence

care_types.name: Memory Care
care_types.description: Specialized care for residents with Alzheimer's and dementia in a secure environment

amenities.name: Restaurant-Style Dining
amenities.description: Chef-prepared meals with multiple dining options daily

amenities.name: Pet Friendly
amenities.description: Pets welcome - we love our furry friends!

floor_plans.name: Studio Apartment
floor_plans.description: Efficient studio layout perfect for individuals. Features kitchenette, spacious closet, and private bathroom.

floor_plans.name: One-Bedroom Deluxe
floor_plans.description: Spacious one-bedroom with separate living area, full kitchen, and private balcony.

team_members.name: Susan Martinez
team_members.bio: Susan has over 25 years of experience in senior living management and is passionate about creating a warm, caring community.

team_members.name: Dr. Michael Chen
team_members.bio: Dr. Chen brings extensive clinical expertise and ensures the highest standards of care for all residents.

team_members.name: Amanda Lopez
team_members.bio: Amanda creates engaging programs that keep residents active, social, and fulfilled every day.

features.title: Person-Centered Care
features.body: We believe in treating each resident as an individual with unique needs, preferences, and dreams. Our care plans are tailored to support the lifestyle each person wants to live.

features.title: Family Atmosphere
features.body: From the moment you walk through our doors, you'll feel the warmth of our community. We're not just a facility - we're a family that supports, celebrates, and cares for one another.

highlights.title: Award-Winning Dining
highlights.description: Our executive chef prepares restaurant-quality meals daily using fresh, local ingredients

highlights.title: Prime Denver Location
highlights.description: Easy access to shopping, parks, medical facilities, and cultural attractions

highlights.title: Active Lifestyle
highlights.description: Daily activities, fitness classes, outings, and social events keep life interesting

highlights.title: 24/7 Care & Security
highlights.description: Licensed nurses and caregivers available around the clock for peace of mind

faqs.question: What is included in the monthly fee?
faqs.answer: Your monthly fee includes apartment rent, utilities (except phone), housekeeping, linen service, scheduled transportation, all meals, activities, and basic cable/Wi-Fi. Care services are customized based on individual needs.

faqs.question: Can I bring my pet?
faqs.answer: Yes! We are a pet-friendly community and welcome cats and small dogs under 25 pounds. There is a small monthly pet fee.

faqs.question: What dining options are available?
faqs.answer: We offer three chef-prepared meals daily in our restaurant-style dining room, plus a bistro with grab-and-go options. Special dietary needs are accommodated, and meals can be delivered to your apartment if needed.

faqs.question: How do I schedule a tour?
faqs.answer: Tours are available seven days a week, and we offer same-day tours! Call us at (303) 555-7890 or use our online contact form to schedule your visit.

galleries.title: Community Spaces
galleries.description: Explore our beautifully designed common areas and amenities

images.caption: Restaurant-style dining room
images.alt: Elegant dining room with large windows

events.title: Summer Garden Party
events.summary: Join us for an afternoon of music, refreshments, and fun in our garden
events.description: Celebrate summer with live music from local musicians, delicious appetizers and refreshments, and games on the lawn. Family and friends welcome!
